instruction: Develop a marketing strategy for a business event on social media
output: We can build up hype and excitement for our business event on social media with a comprehensive marketing strategy. First, we will use influencers to help promote it. We will also create engaging content such as videos and images specific to the event and distribute it regularly on various social media channels. In addition, we can partner with other businesses in our industry to help each other reach more people with our message. Finally, we will use creative hashtags and grow multiple conversations related to the event on our channels.
